name: UIProgressView
desc: A view that depicts the progress of a task over time.

items.name: init(progressViewStyle: UIProgressView.Style)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a progress-view object.

items.name: var progress: Float
items.desc: The current progress shown by the receiver.

items.name: func setProgress(Float, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Adjusts the current progress shown by the receiver, optionally animating the change.

items.name: var observedProgress: Progress?
items.desc: The progress object to use for updating the progress view.

items.name: var progressViewStyle: UIProgressView.Style
items.desc: The current graphical style of the receiver.

items.name: var progressTintColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The color shown for the portion of the progress bar that is filled.

items.name: var progressImage: UIImage?
items.desc: An image to use for the portion of the progress bar that is filled.

items.name: var trackTintColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The color shown for the portion of the progress bar that is not filled.

items.name: var trackImage: UIImage?
items.desc: An image to use for the portion of the track that is not filled.

items.name: enum UIProgressView.Style
items.desc: The styles permitted for the progress bar.
